title: Trump's jibes are wearing thin for many of Europe's leaders
generated_title: Donald Trump's speech at the World Economic Forum in Davos was widely criticised. He said: "Without us, right now you'd all be speaking German" Trump also said he was dropping his latest tariff threat against eight countries.

title: EU suspends approval of US trade deal
generated_title: The European Parliament has suspended the approval of a key US trade deal. The suspension was announced in Strasbourg, France, on Wednesday. It followed renewed trade tensions between the US and Europe sparked by Trump's bid to acquire Greenland.

title: Ex-intelligence officer in Austria's biggest spy trial for years
generated_title: Egisto Ott, 63, is charged with having handed over information to Russian intelligence officers and to Jan Marsalek, the fugitive executive of collapsed German payments firm Wirecard. Ott denies the charges.

title: Seven more countries agree to join Trump's Board of Peace
